page.title: 04RUSHDEN:SURVEY OF SHOPPERS
page.content: {100 shoppers,mainly women,questioned.} 91% live in family units of two adults and usually,two children. 65% own pets. 60% use town shops for the bulk of their shopping but 18% prefer to shop at complexes outside the area. Eating out and drinking in pubs and clubs is the most popular form of enter -tainment.Only 4% go to the theatre. 2% have a computer at home. 48% consider their lives to be fulfill- ing, 40% ordinary, 5% exciting,4% stressful and 2% depressing. {Changes in Rushden} Two large developments are changing the face of the High Street.Firstly the pedestrianisation of the High Street between College Street and Queen Street Secondly the building of a store complex in College Street,just off the High Street.
